generatedSources.name: #utility.yul

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: @notice Constructor sets the owner, goal (in Wei), and deadline (in seconds).

@notice Allows anyone to contribute funds to the project.
 This is a 'payable' function.
@notice Scenario A: Allows the project owner to withdraw funds if the goal is met and deadline passed.
@notice Scenario B: Allows contributors to get a refund if the goal was NOT met and deadline passed.

constructor.notice: Constructor sets the owner, goal (in Wei), and deadline (in seconds).

donate().notice: Allows anyone to contribute funds to the project. This is a 'payable' function.

refund().notice: Scenario B: Allows contributors to get a refund if the goal was NOT met and deadline passed.

withdraw().notice: Scenario A: Allows the project owner to withdraw funds if the goal is met and deadline passed.
